release.action: Introduction of goals mevenide:src-distribution, mevenide:src-distribution-install and mevenide:src-distribution-deploy which are capable of creating a source distribution of the project. It contains sources in the classpath oriented format, suitable for use in IDEs for read-only access to sourcecode -debugging, browsing, better code completion etc.
MEVENIDE-76 - fixed also the debugging of artifact.
Initial release, providing goals for running and debugging the whole project, single classes, tests, single tests.
